entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 12:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain late this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to periods of snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
